about_the_game:
Song of Nothing is an Action Hack and Slash game with dark gothic alternate remnant of the Napoleonic Wars.
Choose one of many character Classes and journey with Jack the Tortured to the end of the Nothing.
Fight Victorian era monstrosities.
Strengthen your characters abilities.
Create your own powerful builds.

"With any luck you will reach the end of the nothing, before everyone completely loses their minds."


Features
- Character Class Build progression
- Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
- Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
- Find rare item variants to further improve your builds
- Unlock portions of the town of Safe haven of the Nothing.

short_description: Fight through the twisted Napolean era nightmares of the nothing in this Hack and Slash adventure. Go solo, or with a party to reach the end of the nothing before everyone loses their minds. Chose your abilities, and master combos, while unlocking new areas of solstice along the way.
